The video showing Khalistan supporters r: India slogans at Rahul Gandhi's event in London.
Testimonies from eyewitnesses: such as Shamsher Singh, spokesperson for the National Sikh Youth Federation, who admitted to gatecrashing the event with three associates.
Confirmation from Naomi Canton: a reporter for Times of India in the UK, who stated that the event was interrupted by four protesters who managed to evade heavy security.
Previous debunking of the video by Alt N: highlighting that the protesters had seized a lapse in security to gain entry to the event.
